problem_statement.given: Historical house data (square feet, bedrooms, bathrooms, age, neighborhood quality, garage)
problem_statement.for: Real estate platform users (buyers and sellers)
problem_statement.to_optimize: Reduce average listing time by 15% and increase user engagement by 20%
problem_statement.full_statement: Given historical house features, predict the selling price immediately to help real estate platform users make faster decisions, thereby reducing listing time by 15%.

secondary: User engagement (clicks on estimates) increased by 20%

product_metric.primary: User clicks on price estimate and proceeds to list house
secondary: Time spent on listing page increased
User returns to platform within 7 days

model_metric.slice_metrics: Performance consistent across price ranges and neighborhoods

guardrail_3.name: Error rate
guardrail_3.rule: < 1% of predictions return NaN or error

guardrail_4.name: Prediction range
guardrail_4.action_if_violated: Clip to range and log anomaly

hard_constraints: Model must be explainable (linear model preferred)
Training data must be < 90 days old
All features must be available at decision time (no future leakage)
Model must beat baseline by at least 20%

scenario_1.impact: User lists house at inflated price, doesn't sell
scenario_1.rollback_path: Revert to previous model within 5 minutes

scenario_4.failure: Model returns NaN for 5% of requests

monitoring_alerts: MAE increases by > 20% compared to baseline
